title: PRIMER REPORTE EN QUARTO
text:
Code
import altair as alt
from vega_datasets import data
cars = data.cars()
print(cars.head())


                        Name  Miles_per_Gallon  Cylinders  Displacement  \
0  chevrolet chevelle malibu              18.0          8         307.0   
1          buick skylark 320              15.0          8         350.0   
2         plymouth satellite              18.0          8         318.0   
3              amc rebel sst              16.0          8         304.0   
4                ford torino              17.0          8         302.0   

   Horsepower  Weight_in_lbs  Acceleration       Year Origin  
0       130.0           3504          12.0 1970-01-01    USA  
1       165.0           3693          11.5 1970-01-01    USA  
2       150.0           3436          11.0 1970-01-01    USA  
3       150.0           3433          12.0 1970-01-01    USA  
4       140.0           3449          10.5 1970-01-01    USA  









Code
alt.Chart(cars).mark_point().encode(
    x="Miles_per_Gallon",
    y="Horsepower",
    tooltip=["Name","Origin","Miles_per_Gallon","Horsepower"]
).interactive()
#interactive: zoom, brush













Code
alt.Chart(cars).mark_point(filled=True).encode(
    x="Miles_per_Gallon",
    y="Horsepower",
    color="Origin",
    tooltip=["Name","Origin","Miles_per_Gallon","Horsepower"]
).interactive()










Code
alt.Chart(cars).mark_point(filled=True).encode(
    x="Miles_per_Gallon",
    y="Horsepower",
    shape="Origin",
    color = "Origin",
    tooltip=["Name","Origin","Miles_per_Gallon","Horsepower"]
).interactive()











Grafico de barras


Code
alt.Chart(cars).mark_bar().encode(
    alt.X('Origin',sort='y'),
    alt.Y('count()')
)








Mean()de cada uno de los origenes


Code
alt.Chart(cars).mark_bar().encode(
    alt.X('Origin',sort='y'),
    alt.Y('mean(Weight_in_lbs)'),
    tooltip=['Origin','mean(Weight_in_lbs)']
).properties(
    width= 200,
    height = 200
)








Grafico lineal


Code
alt.Chart(cars).mark_line(point=True).encode(
    alt.X('Year'),
    alt.Y('mean(Weight_in_lbs)'),
    alt.Color('Origin')
).properties(
    width = 600
).interactive()

title: PRIMER REPORTE EN QUARTO
text:
Code
import altair as alt
from vega_datasets import data
cars = data.cars()
print(cars.head())


                        Name  Miles_per_Gallon  Cylinders  Displacement  \
0  chevrolet chevelle malibu              18.0          8         307.0   
1          buick skylark 320              15.0          8         350.0   
2         plymouth satellite              18.0          8         318.0   
3              amc rebel sst              16.0          8         304.0   
4                ford torino              17.0          8         302.0   

   Horsepower  Weight_in_lbs  Acceleration       Year Origin  
0       130.0           3504          12.0 1970-01-01    USA  
1       165.0           3693          11.5 1970-01-01    USA  
2       150.0           3436          11.0 1970-01-01    USA  
3       150.0           3433          12.0 1970-01-01    USA  
4       140.0           3449          10.5 1970-01-01    USA

text:
